decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):

Drawing number A_1000 00 - Location plan, Drawing number B-100 01 - Existing floor plan, Drawing number B-101 01 - Existing roof plan, Drawing number B-200 01 - Existing front and rear elevation, Drawing number B-201 01 - Existing side elevation and section, Drawing number B-300 01 - Existing side elevation and section, Drawing number A-100 01 - Proposed floor plan, Drawing number A-101 02 - Proposed roof plan, Drawing number A-200 01 - Proposed side elevation and section, Drawing number A-200 01 - Proposed front and rear elevations, Drawing number A-300 01 - Proposed side sections, Drawing number D011 01 - Window elevations and details, Drawing number D012 01 - Window elevations and details,
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, the proposed windows on the front elevation shall be white in colour.

Reason: To ensure that the materials are of an appropriate quality/ standard as to preserve the character and appearance of the site and conservation area, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| The permitted rooflights shall at all times be of a conservation style. These shall also at all times be flush with the roofslope.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Increase the height of the two storey projection to the side, creation of a dormer windows to the rear roofslopes with one incorporating a Juliet balcony, and installation of roof lights to front and rear roof slope; replacement of the existing windows for double glazing timber sash windows.
